title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirty or modified, even though no actual changes have been made. Additionally, the code assist feature fails to appear.
EB: The file should not be marked as dirty or modified unless there are actual changes made to the file. The code assist feature should be triggered and displayed as expected when invoked.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a file in the code editor. 
2. Invoke the code assist feature. 
3. Observe that the file is marked as dirty or modified, even though no changes have been made. 
4. Note that the code assist feature does not appear.
